item.description:
Meeting is at my house which is the Idle Dog in Maynard. Of course, this will be our Holiday Celebration, but we're going to keep the specific holiday a secret. Show up to find out what we're celebrating. There will be appropriate toys for owners and their favorite pups. Don't let this demanding season interrupt your best friend's fun (or yours).


Deb
item.how_to_find_us: For directions, see my website: www.theidledog.com

group.name: The Massachusetts Small Breed Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: The Massachusetts Small Breed Dogs December Meetup
